SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine

Class Color

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine.Color
public final class Color extends Object
Represents RGBA colors for rendering in the game engine. Provides standard predefined colors and support for custom color creation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Color

      public Color(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Creates a color with the specified RGBA components in float format (0.0-1.0).
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0.0-1.0)
      g - Green component (0.0-1.0)
      b - Blue component (0.0-1.0)
      a - Alpha component (0.0-1.0)

    • Color

      public Color(float r, float g, float b)
      Creates an opaque color with the specified RGB components in float format (0.0-1.0). Alpha is set to 1.0 (fully opaque).
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0.0-1.0)
      g - Green component (0.0-1.0)
      b - Blue component (0.0-1.0)
      See Also:
      • For specifying alpha

    • Color

      public Color(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Creates a color with the specified RGBA components in integer format (0-255). Values are converted to the float range (0.0-1.0).
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0-255)
      g - Green component (0-255)
      b - Blue component (0-255)
      a - Alpha component (0-255)
      See Also:
      • For float format

    • Color

      public Color(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates an opaque color with the specified RGB components in integer format (0-255). Alpha is set to 255 (fully opaque).
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0-255)
      g - Green component (0-255)
      b - Blue component (0-255)
      See Also:
      • For specifying alpha
